grants.description: Verify your identity using GOV.UK One Login
grants.purpose: DWP must verify your identity before processing your claim

grants.description: Share your income and employment information with DWP
grants.purpose: DWP uses your income data to calculate your Universal Credit entitlement

grants.description: Share your housing details for housing cost calculations
grants.purpose: To calculate any housing element of your Universal Credit

grants.description: Verify your bank account for receiving payments
grants.purpose: UC payments will be made to this account

revocation.mechanism: Contact DWP UC helpline or revoke through your UC journal online
revocation.effect: Revoking income-sharing consent will suspend your claim until reinstated

delegation.limitations: Agent cannot verify bank details on your behalf. Agent cannot commit to interview times. Agent will hand off for any safeguarding concerns.
